channel.title: Lamps
channel.description: Can anyone help me with lamps? i want them to work. Idk the interface it opens and idk how to make it give xp for each skill.. so if someone has an idea, help's nice thanks

item.title: Lamps
item.dc:creator: @bmw981 bmw981
item.description:
@bmw981 wrote:

awesome, thanks man. But i was guna make clue scrolls lead you to getting a lamp or 2. and make clue scrolls rare so lamps are rare ya kno? Idk i thought it’d be fun to add maybe… thanks again tho.

PS. the link didn’t work for me…?

item.title: Lamps
item.dc:creator: @Sinior_Jube_Head Sinior Jube Head
item.description:
@Sinior_Jube_Head wrote:

Hey BMW, I have an answer for you mate, simply because you are trying to help me with my problem also.

Simply go to this link: http://www.google.org/showthread.php?t=33957

It has eerything for it, i assume, as i have not used it for my server as i dont know as of yet a good way for the lamps to be gotten :\

[shadow=red,left][center]Hope it Helps,

~ Sinior Jube Head[/center][/shadow]

EDIT: Fixed link, so yeah. should work now.

FFS - Mopar forums wont let me post a google link, idk why. go to www . google . org, then tutorials, then the stickied “giant tutorial list” and the one made by ELF , the first or second one on list, entitled genie lamps, is it. sorry for link… stupid mopar security…lol

EDIT2: evry time i say “rne-srver” (u after first ‘r’, e after first ‘s’) it comes up as ‘google’, so, just go to the website i mentioned and replace ‘google’ with ‘rne-srver’ ( u after first ‘r’, e after first ‘s’) You know… the thing that says: www . google . org ? dont put spaces in, and replace ‘google’ with ‘rne-srver’ (u after first r, e after first s) hope i helped…

Read full topic
